title: 'Unethically priced.'
body: 'Not solid and sturdy. You have to assemble. Why should one make it if they are paying money for that? Ikea is over-hyped. Poor quality. Uncomfortable to sit. It has plastic a lot. Not worth it at all. Never buy this.'

title: 'Fashionable attractive chairs.'

title: 'Defective product.'
body: 'This purchase has been a nightmare. We put a chair together and found 1 leg to be shorter than the others. Initiated a return and demanded a refund. Seller refuses that the product is defective. Refused a full refund claiming the order was opened. It has been 4 business days since the product has been returned and the current status is still just "picked up the item"'
